name: panchangam-app
description: Panchangam Calendar App - Full Stack Development

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
scripts.clean: cd frontend && pnpm clean && cd ../backend && find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

author: Panchangam Dev Team
